news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent calls for a review of 'the entire' Federal Reserve
news.summary: Bessent suggested for a review that would go beyond the current controversy over building renovations. Bessent: "We need to look at how we can improve the quality of life in this community"

news.title: U.S. plays hardball on tariffs deadline as EU battles for a deal
news.summary: The U.S. is keeping up the pressure on the Aug. 1 deadline for higher tariffs for the EU. The EU has threatened to retaliate with higher tariffs on American goods.

news.title: Jeep maker Stellantis warns of a shock $2.7 billion loss as tariffs bite
news.summary: Stellantis released preliminary estimates for the first six months of the year. The company withdrew its full-year financial guidance earlier this month.

news.title: CoreWeave stock climbs after company announces $1.5 billion bond sale
news.summary: CoreWeave stock climbed after the renter of artificial intelligence data centers said it plans to sell $1.5 billion worth of bonds.

news.title: LVMH-backed investor group takes 20% stake in private jet company Flexjet
news.summary: The deal highlights the luxury industry's rapid expansion into the experience economy. It comes as wealthy consumers increase spending on travel, dining and events.

news.title: Palantir, Coinbase and these other volatile stocks are too crowded, says JPMorgan. Here’s the trade to make instead.
news.summary: JPMorgan strategists say rush into so-called high-beta names is a red-flag for the market. JPMorgan strategists: 'High-beta' names are a risk to the market's long-term growth.

news.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades these two companies as it says Amazon is the best internet stock on ground
news.summary: The outlook for internet stocks is rosier now that worst-case scenarios of U.S. tariffs on China appear to have been avoided.

news.title: Why Trump’s next Fed chair may not deliver the interest-rate cuts investors expect
news.summary: Trump wants to replace Jerome Powell with a Fed chair who will do what he wants. But that still may not produce the steep cuts Wall Street is counting on.

news.title: Is buying a condo a bad idea in this real-estate market?
news.summary: “‘Why do people talk about them like they’re so evil?’” he asks. “’Why do they look like they are so evil?'”

news.title: Trump’s tariffs has made this company, and its investors, happy
news.summary: Cleveland-Cliffs CEO Lourenco Goncalves said the steelmaker is starting to see the positive impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on domestic manufacturing. He expects increased demand from U.S. automakers.
